name: Artist Block
description:
Art is hard! You have to learn how to draw all those fancy shapes and still need to find the inspiration to make something unique out of them afterwards. It’s no wonder you are still stuck in your artist block. Luckily enough, you’ve got your trusty artist mannequin to help you think of some new ideas.

Artist Block is a game about striking poses with challenging and wacky controls. Swing the mannequin around with the mouse and freeze them in place with keys on the keyboard in order to get through progressively more difficult obstacles. Start by learning the basic shapes, and you will soon start overcoming recognizable patterns. Maybe you will even hit the perfect pose and overcome your Artist Block!

Artist Block is a student project developed with Unity at USC Games in collaboration with Berklee College of Music.

IMPORTANT FOR MAC USERS!

You might have issues with your download... but that's okay! Here's a handy dandy guide for you :)
